properties.Name: UAE Border Crossing
properties.description: It cost 35 dirhams per person to exit the UAE by land.

properties.Name: Oman Border Crossing
properties.description: For UAE residents, an Oman visa on arrival cost 50 dirhams.

properties.Name: Khasab, Mussandam
properties.description: The trip from Abu Dhabi to Khasab took about 5 hours. When the carpool arrived, we got on a small speed boat to go out to the dhow in the harbour.

properties.Name: Khasab Harbour
properties.description: The first night was spent sleeping on the open-air dhow in the middle of the Khasab Harbour. The trip leaders had falafel delivered to the ship for a late night snack!Â

properties.Name: Telegraph Island
properties.description: From the dhow, I swam about 100 meters to Telegraph Island. It's an old British telegraph station and now has some ruins of the former buildings. It is a popular stop for the dhow cruises.

properties.Name: Stop 1 for kayaking
properties.description: After setting sail in the early morning, the dhow made a stop around 9 for kayaking. On the way to the first stop, we saw some dolphins!

properties.Name: Kumzar
properties.description: Kumzar is a small village that is accessible only by boat. The group had two planned hikes that are accessed behind the small village of Kumzar. After the hike, one of the dhow captains' aunts invited us to her house for tea and snacks! It was incredibly generous and a wonderful experience.

properties.Name: Hiking stop point
properties.description: This is roughly where the group hiked through. It was difficult to get the exact point from Google imagery because we were hiking through a wadi that is not very visible.

properties.Name: Beach dinner
properties.description: Dinner Friday was cooked and served on a small, isolated beach.

properties.Name: Bioluminescent bay
properties.description: The bay the dhow was anchored for the second night was bioluminescent! On Saturday, I opted to sleep in and kayak around the bay instead of go on the second hike.

properties.Name: Stop 2 for kayaking
properties.description: Before reaching Kumzar, we had a second kayak and snorkelling stop. There was a beach and a few small caves. I saw a sea turtle!

properties.Name: Stop 3 for kayaking
properties.description: Before heading back to Khasab and Abu Dhabi, there was one final kayak and snorkeling stop.
